Title: Undeck the Halls
Plot: The Dunphy kids are in trouble again, but this time Claire and Phil are threatening to take Christmas away. Gloria and Manny want to incorporate some of their Colombian practices into Jay's holiday traditions, but he wants to keep it his way. Meanwhile Cameron and Mitchell take Lily to the mall for her first picture with Santa, however this Santa isn't very jolly.
ParentalRatingReason: PG Coarse language and sexual references
GuestStars: Brian T. Finney, Fred Willard, Jeremy Scott Johnson
